product_name: Salomon Equipe 60 Carbon Cross-Country Poles - Pair
long_description: Cruise down groomed trails with the Salomon Equipe 60 Carbon cross-country ski poles. Feature lightweight 60% carbon shafts with a 16mm top diameter and a 9mm bottom diameter. Cork grips are comfortable to hold on cold days; thumb rests make for efficient, powerful pole plants. Straps remove quickly and easily from the grips, letting you keep the straps on your gloves for convenience while freeing yourself from the poles. Adjustable straps offer a precise fit. The Salomon Equipe 60 Carbon cross-country poles include lightweight racing baskets.
short_description: Cruise down groomed trails with the Salomon Equipe 60 Carbon cross-country ski poles.
